TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BasicDigitalTwin extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An optional, helper class for deserializing a digital twin.
Docs.remarks:
This helper class will only work with . When used with the , parameter to it will only work with the default ().
For more samples, see our repo samples.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Property Contents As IDictionary(Of String, Object)
member this.Contents : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, obj> with get, set

Docs.summary: This field will contain properties and components as defined in the contents section of the DTDL definition of the twin.
Docs.remarks: If the property is a component, use the class to deserialize the payload.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ETag As Nullable(Of ETag)
member this.ETag : Nullable<Azure.ETag> with get, set

Docs.summary: A string representing a weak ETag for the entity that this request performs an operation against, as per RFC7232.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Id : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The unique Id of the digital twin in a digital twins instance. This field is present on every digital twin.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastUpdatedOn As Nullable(Of DateTimeOffset)

Docs.summary: The date and time the twin was last updated.
Information about the model a digital twin conforms to. This field is present on every digital twin.
